duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and analyze healthcare data using SQL for optimizing prescription drug programs and improving patient outcomes.
Gather and manage requirements using both Waterfall and Agile SDLC methodologies.
Develop and implement processes to enhance Pharmacy Benefit Management (PBM) and optimize prescription drug programs.
Work with messaging and event-based systems to facilitate seamless communication within healthcare operations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Healthcare Informatics, Health Administration, or a related field (Master's preferred)
